column9: employees must be allowed to carry over up to half of unused   paid sick leave (a maximum of 20 hours) unless the employer sets a higher limit.  • If subject to Family and Medical Leave Act (FMLA)
column10: each employee must be allowed to carry over up to  40 hours of unused paid sick leave
